mapper.insert: insert into user (username, password, nickname, age, gender) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{age}, #{gender});
insert into user_authority (user_no, authority) values((select no from user where username = #{username}), 'USER_ROLE');
mapper.update: update user set nickname = #{nickname}, age = #{age}, gender = {gender}, profile_image = #{profileImage}, introduce = #{introduce} where username = #{username}
update user set password = #{password} where username = #{username}
